hotels.name: Beijing Minzu Hotel (北京民族饭店)
hotels.notes: Central location near Tiananmen Square. Good for layovers and business travelers. Recent positive reviews (within 5 months).

hotels.name: Beijing Yunjing Mingyi Hotel - Wangfujing (北京云景明谊酒店王府井店)
hotels.location: 161 Beiheyan Street, Donghuamen Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing
hotels.notes: Excellent location near Wangfujing shopping street and walking distance to Tiananmen Square and Forbidden City. Rating 4.5/5. Hotel ordering rank: 1 (top choice).

notes: Yunjing Mingyi is closer to Tiananmen Square (~1.5km vs 2.5km)
Minzu Hotel offers more international amenities and English-language services
Wangfujing area offers excellent shopping and dining options
March weather in Beijing: Cool temperatures (5-15°C), recommend checking forecast closer to dates
